body_content.explanation: a connection or relationship between two or more facts, numbers, etc.:
examples: There's a correlation between smoking and cancer.
Some evidence even suggests there is a negative correlation between quality and expenditure in health care (= when one goes up, the other goes down).
The study found a positive correlation between sleep and higher achievement at school (= when one increases, the other also increases).
Do sodium levels in the body have a direct correlation with high blood pressure?
Some are not convinced that the crackdown on drugs in the city has any correlation to the fall in violent crime.
